main event: Witnesses observed a fiery red spherical object in Garden Grove, California, hovering and moving back and forth on 6 November 1957.
interesting points: The object was described as round and approximately the size of a quarter., Witnesses noted the object moved erratically before hovering., The possibility of the object being a balloon was considered but could not be concluded., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., The object's behavior was similar to that of an unidentifiable flying object rather than a common aerial phenomenon.
